name: loop-drop
description: MIDI looper, modular synth and sampler app built around Novation Launchpad controller.
author: Matt McKegg

scripts.release-mac: mkdir -p build && rm -rf build/* && electron-packager ./ "Loop Drop" --prune --platform=darwin --version=0.28.1 --arch=x64 --ignore="(build|releases|test|sounds|doc|tests|mocha|node_modules/midi)/" --out="build" --app-version=`npv` --icon=icon.icns && sh codesign.sh && appdmg appdmg.json "releases/Loop Drop v`npv`.dmg"
scripts.release-win: mkdir -p build && rm -rf build/* && electron-packager ./ "Loop Drop" --prune --platform=win32 --version=0.28.1 --arch=x64 --ignore="(build|releases|test|sounds|doc|tests|mocha|node_modules/midi)/" --out="build" --app-version=`npv` --icon=icon.ico
scripts.release-linux: mkdir -p build && rm -rf build/* && electron-packager ./ "Loop Drop" --prune --platform=linux --version=0.28.1 --arch=x64 --ignore="(build|releases|test|sounds|doc|tests|mocha|node_modules/midi)/" --out="build" --app-version=`npv` --icon=icon.ico
